Attributes.description: Principles and methods of epidemiology are applied to clinical problems. Evaluation and design of laboratory and clinical tests and of therapeutic interventions.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of HCEP 400, HCEP 502 or (b) one of SPPH 400, SPPH 502.
